desc: A cracked ankh, with very little magic left in it.

dictionary.lore: A cracked ankh, with very little magic left in it. In a more prosperous time, when the people of Urzyma actively worshipped the gods, they were granted access to magical arts in return. Magical energies were stored in beautful handcrafted ankhs, which were carried around on persons.

name: Shattered Faith
